content.detailedDescription:
I was awakened by exceedingly bright light flashes in the southern sky. these persisted for longer than the hour i continued to observe them in the low southern sky. the night was clear, but this phenomenon seemed to have a cloud associated with it and repeatedly came from 2 distinct locations. i got out our leitz 10x binoculars in an attempt to see better what was going on. it seemed like gigantic arc welders were illuminating the sky with varying blasts of very intense light. there was no sound associated with the lights. i began observing this @ 2:34 am and it continued for longer than the 70 minutes i stayed awake watching. i was uncertain whether or not some of the light blasts had star-like movement associated with them and decided to look elsewhere in the sky when i detected a brightest star in the sky almost 180 degrees away from the lightning like display. when i first looked at this light with binoculars i thought my hands were shaking because of its movements, so i braced my hands and binoculars against the house and then realized that none of the other stars were moving, but that this one had rapid, tight movements and color changes associated with it. i observed it "drifting" in the sky while wildly darting and spinning in a fairly tight circle and there were always color changes going on at the same time. the shakiness and pinpoint intensity of the light reminded me of a hand held laser pointer but all the light appeared to be emanating from the source as opposed to being projected.

i finally awakened my wife, handed her the binoculars and asked her to tell me what she saw. her description corroborated my observations and we are both convinced that we witnessed a phenomenon outside any normal celestial observation that has no logical explanation. this sighting remained in the sky without interruption until i went back to bed
content.summary: Observed what appearred to be a bright star. using 10x binoculars was able to observe rapid movement, changing colors, and position changes

content.detailedDescription:
I would like to report that last night at 8:30 pm feb. 19th i saw a single orange object over sparta,mi while standing outside on a deck. i was taking my dogs out at the time and often watch the night sky. i first noticed it due to its non-ordinary appearance. i really had no explanation of what hte object was, just that i knew it seemed odd.

this is the report i sent to [name redacted/cms/tg] at [site redacted/cms/tg]

i saw it first coming from the north traveling southward. the object was moving slow and had no sound. it seemed to be quite large in the sky and had no other color other than orange. it then got to about almost an eastward viewing still at about 60-70 degrees overhead and began to fade (almost as if it were gaining a lot of altitude). it took about 10-20 seconds then disappeared all together. i know the report you have says it describes 13 objects, but i only witnessed this one.

i knew it was not an aircraft that is known to me and was not a meteorite or shooting star. the best way i could describe it when i first saw it was a glowing orange sphere and about the size of a soccer ball in the sky. it seemed close, almost like that of a helicopter in regards of distance.It wasnt until it was about 2/3rds of its visibility that it got smaller and faded.

unfortunately i have no evidence of this, just my eye witness report. my wife was at home but she works third shift. i did run in the door at one point to wake her, but by the time she got to the door it had faded away.
content.summary: An orange glowing sphere

content.detailedDescription:
I was heading into work when i noticed object traveling from east to west. it seemed round and kinda flickered almost like it was rotating with sunlight reflecting off of it as it moved west. i started recording it with my phone and tracked it as it past behind a brick building. when it reemerged it literally shot out the other side. somehow it accelerated instantly and then just as suddenly slowed down.At the time i thought my eyes were playing tricks on me. after reviewing the shaky footage it did indeed appear to do what i had witnessed. after stabilizing the footage the acceleration of the object is clearly seen and in my opinion is quite remarkable.

object continued traveling east then banked to a more south east direction. i stopped recording at that point so i could get into work on time.
content.summary: Orb like object rapidly accelerates & decellerates

content.detailedDescription: I was sitting on my back porch noticed 4 white objects hovering in a diamond shaped pattern. i ran down into my basement and grabbed my camcorder. i managed to record some shaky footage while pointing out to my wife where to look in the sky. i paused recording to mount camcorder on tripod which my wife brought out to me. this took less than a minute. once i was up and running again on one orb remained which descended behind tree line.
content.summary: 4 orb like objects hovering in a diamond shape pattern

content.detailedDescription:
Stepped out to back yard to have a smoke and noticed a aircraft (plane)traveling at approx. 40 deg. moving e. to w.  at reg. commercial height 30-35,000 ft.
then scanned sky and noticed a very bright very fast moving pulsating red light. this object was moving from a wnw to e direction and upon getting within a half mile or so from airplane made a very sharp turn to the sse in under a second. if i had blinked i would have not seen the turn. the object seemed to be under the airplanes altitude but not by much from my vantage piont.It seemed to turn to go under the plane . i then ran in the back door and grabbed my binoculars and ran out the front to try and see what this was, i didnt have time to get the camera.
looking at it i noticed
1. it had no regular type running lights and pulsated very slowly from bright red to a dim orange/yellow.
2. it was moving two to three times the speed of the oncoming aircraft.
3.It made no noise that i could hear.I could hear the airplane as it passed by after the object was gone from sight.
4. it should have made a sonic boom but did not.
5.This object was completely out of sight in less than a minute(commercial aircraft take several minutes from in sight to out of sight)
6.The size of the light was much bigger than the whole airplane.
7.The pilot of the aircraft must have seen this,due to the brightness and close proximity of said object.
after watching the light go out of sight at 20 deg. or so i returned to the back yard and could see and hear the airplane (jet)and watched it for a few seconds then went to explain to the family why i was acting like a crazy person.
 hope this was helpful and maybe the pilot of the aircraft will come forward , but we both know that is not likely. feel free to call my cell if you have any questions. thanks.......
content.summary: Observed aircraft then noticed ufo heading toward aircraft, ufo then changed direction.

content.detailedDescription: The sighting was at midnight by my wife and daughter,are liveing room window faces west.They started looking after receaveing a call from a friend to look out side to the west they went out side stod on are front porch.They looked up to the area they were told to look and there first was one then two more appeard,they were side by side then two just vanished then came back this time on top of one another they were there for around a hr then just disappeared.
content.summary: The lights were seen to the south west of okotoks alberta over the mountains they came and went started with one then three .

content.detailedDescription: As i proceeding to a stop sign i looked up and saw two slightly orange, round lights in the sky. they were next to each other. the first thing i thought of was ufo. i have not seen anything like this before. unless the neighbors were shooting something into the sky which is not likely. anyway, the lights were moving it the sky. as i pulled up to my driveway i looked behind me as i pulled in and saw another light and it faded into the sky very slowly in the same spot. then about 3 minutes later, i saw the same type of orange light and it looked like it came from the ground and proceeded to go higher in the sky and just slowly went higher in the sky and then disappeared again. i heard no fireworks blowing off or any sounds at all that resembled fire works. i believe that this lights could have been ufo.
content.summary: Slightly orange round lights moving in the sky.

content.detailedDescription:
Walking,enjoying clear sky (no clouds or moon). saw what appeared an ember (yellow,orange -- glowing)in the sky. thought it was a meteor but it wasn't. then thought perhaps it was a small plane on fire so we watched. 
as it came closer it was definitely not a plane --- no noise, plus it hovered over us for about 30 seconds then sped up in a direct northern path. 

my other two friends had walked further down the street and talked to a lady walking a dog---she had also seen it.
content.summary: Glowing ember appearance with direct north path, once near us it hovered then proceeded, never zigzagged or fell

content.detailedDescription: Went into my back garden with my partner and her little boy, and she noticed this really bright light coming from the south. as we watched it, it changed direction with a pulse of light and started travelling in a different direction. it travelled south-west for 4 minutes or so then, when a plane entered that air space it turned abruptly and carried on the same direction, the plane stayed on course, after travelling for a few more minutes it pulsed/flashed and disappeared. there was no sound and nothing like i have ever seen before, very bright and fast.
content.summary: Spotted very bright light with ring around,  that changed course and turned abruptly to avoid plane. then pulsed and disappeared .

content.detailedDescription: Just got up in the morning, and looked outside.  saw 5 jets go flying over leaving contrails.  so i grabbed my camera and went outside to see if there were any strange objects in the sky like there were yesterday.  noticed to the southeast of my viewing position a very bright, glowing object which did not appear to be moving.  took pic and watched it for about 2 additional minutes.  2 more jets came behind the other 5.
content.summary: Saw 5 jets and their contrails fly over and ran and got camera, saw unknown object

content.detailedDescription:
My mother and i had snuck ouside to have a couple drags off of a cigarrete while my father was taking a shower(he didn't know that i smoked, and was apposed to my mother smoking).  we went around to the south-west side of the house and leaned our backs to the wall, standing side by side under the eve, about a foot apart.  i felt my mother tense up next to me and she started to hit my arm frantically, remaining silent, i looked over at her at once to find her staring straight up with her jaw wide open.  i followed her gaze into the sky, then my jaw fell, directly above us(we were actually under an oak tree that had lost it's leaves for the year as well) was a large black sillouette of a triangle with strange blue-silverish round lights on all three corners and one slightly larger in the center.  it was less than 100 feet above us, it hovered what seemed like was just above the 50-60 foot oak tree, very close.  not only was it silient, but the lights on the object never reached the ground, the area was not lit, no shadows out of place.  the lights were a strange blue and almost looked like there was a liquid texture to them that kinda swirrelled behind the lens, but as i said they didn't actually "shine".  the center light remained stationary while the three outer lights blinked in succesion, giving the illusion, i think it was an illusion, that it was spinning, i remember trying to decide if it was or not.  i think i remember some straight lines, and right angled lines on the bottom, but mostly it was a black sillouete.  we both stood there staring at it silently for a while, mesmurized.  i would estimate no more than five minutes elapsed.  then i heard a strange noise, it was my mothers voice trying to escape her throat.  it started as a deep gutural sound that strained from her chest, i remember thinking it seemed to come out really slow and forced but she finally managed to scream: donald!(my fathers name).  this snapped me out of my trance and i heard a commotion in the house, wich i realized was my dad rushing out of the shower and sprinting through the house to the front door upon hearing his wife call his name in that manor.  just as i heard him aproach the door the object exploded into a perfect ring of red, blue, and green capsules of light.  my mom and i both yelled whoa! at the same time. it turned into a little red blinking light and sped off as my dad flung the door open, naked as a jay bird with soap in his hair and toso.  by this time i was yelling at my mom "oh my god what was that"  completely amazed and excited, we ignored my dad who had just sprinted from the shower to see a red blinking light speeding off."thats an airplane," he told us noncholantly.  our excitement quickly convinced him otherwise.  luckily in all the excitement he didn't notice the cigarrete in my hand, but neither did i at that moment.  he finished his shower then joined me and my mom briefly in scanning the sky.
  this next part is the strangest part of the story, mostly due to the fact i totally forgot about it for 15 years!  when the memory came back to me(semi recently) it came to me as if i had never forgotten it, i can't remember what trigered it.
  later that same night i woke up with a start(i slept in a small camper trailor about 50 feet from the main house),  i looked out my window and i could see everything in the yard, the light kinda reminded me of when lightning strikes, that silverylight, only it was steady, it didnt even produce shadow it was so bright outside, the yard was truly flooded in light, i didn't actually see the source but i could tell it was from not to far above my trailor.  i closed my eyes and laid back down immediatly, hoping it would be gone when i opened them, but it wasn't.  my only rational thought was to grab my 22 caliber rifle for protection.  isummoned the strength to sit up and swing my legs off the bed and open the cuppoard where i usually kept it.  my heart sank to my toes when i realized it was in the house.  the yard was still saturated with the strange light as i got out of bed and looked out of other windows to make sure.  i paced from one end of the trailor to the other 2-3 times.  i remember thinking to myself with grimm reaization"i've gotta make it to the house"  i was certain my dad would know what to do.  i stood at the door of my trailor with my hand on the door lever, but i was so scared i couldn't bring myself to push down.  i cosciencly made an attempt to control my breathing as a stood at the door, the light still bright on the other side of it.  i realized it wasn't going away, so in my mind i decided "i cant stay out here, i gotta make it to the house!"  i took several deep breaths and counted to three before i flung the door open and took off in a flat sprint for the house.  i had probably covered 25 feet before i realized it was gone, the light, the fear, the heavy breathing, gone.  the only way i can describe the feeling is like this: you ever go to take a drink of milk but it winds up being kool-ade instead. your sense of taste is almost startled by it, confused.  that probably dosen't make sense to anyone but me.  i stood midway between my trailor and the house in complete darkness and silence totaly confused and disoriented.  "i'm going in the house anyway's!" i thought to my self and started off in that direction then stopped, thinking "what am i gonna tell my dad" i turned around and headed back towards my trailor a few steps, stopped and thought,"i should at least go get my gun" turned back towards the house, stopped again and thought "why?" i walked back to my trailor reluctantly and laid in bed for hours, wide awake staring ou the window, but nothing else happened.  then i forgot the entire event until i was 31 years old (i was sixteen when it occured)
content.summary: Outside with mother,  large triangle craft hovered directly above lights on three corners and middle. changed dramatically into blinking light, left, returning later

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the back (8:23pm), looked up and saw a red bright sphere like shape moving very slow so i thought it was a plane or jet, not even a second it just move down fast and then right back to the same spot, so i ran to get my wife and son to see it, so we went into the front yard and the thing was moving like up and down side to side but in the same spot,then we noteice that it move to the left and stoped and sped off far to the same spot but farther away then vanished.(8:29) now here the werid part, i have a picture i took 3 years ago feb.14 2009 i have send aswell. same area the ones in the picture are not red ones.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red sphere shape with red inner orb like center.

content.detailedDescription: I was outside in the back (8:23pm), looked up and saw a red bright sphere like shape moving very slow so i thought it was a plane or jet, not even a second it just move down fast and then right back to the same spot, so i ran to get my wife and son to see it, so we went into the front yard and the thing was moving like up and down side to side but in the same spot,then we noteice that it move to the left and stoped and sped off far to the same spot but farther away then vanished.(8:29) now here the werid part, i have a picture i took 3 years ago feb.14 2009 i have send aswell. same area the ones in the picture are not red ones.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Red sphere shape with red inner orb like center.

content.detailedDescription:
Approx 830pm cst. i turned off the tv and looked out my window that faces west to have a look at the stars when i noticed what look liked a bright star or airplane headlight. i got out my 10x binoculars to view the object up close to see if it was moving. when i noticed that it was moving relative to the stars i thought i would see its strobe light since it was probably an airplane. when i didn't see any strobes i continued to observe the object through the binoculars. 

my next thought was that it must be the space station as it was too bright to be a satellite. the object moved about the same speed as an airplane. as it moved closer i noticed two bright orange colored lights underneath and to the rear of the object. when it was almost overhead, and when i managed to keep the binoculars very still i noticed a faint blinking red light in the center of the object. it seemed to be a triangular shaped object with two orange colored lights in back, one faint blinking red light in the center, and one bright white light in the front. it was too dark to make out any features. 

i lost sight of the object when it flew overhead. no sound. i looked online to see where the current location of the space station was. when i found out is was still west of me i knew it couldn't be that.
content.summary: Lights in a triagular patern moving from west to east.

content.detailedDescription: Note all pictures were made off a game camera, and note the time of the pictures, and the camera was not moved, pick the camera up about a week later.
content.summary: Blue hat  looking and a pink sign like

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were outside smoking on the back patio. i was noticing on how clear the sky was in we were pointing out stars to each other. out of the corner of my eye i saw this red flashing and pulsating light. it was so far up it looked star-like. i didn't really know what it was. it seemed to not be making any noise at all. i have never witnessed anything like this it was a little exciting. it was going in a straight path heading west. my boyfriend and i watched it until it dissappeared behind the houses. i had to immediately go straight to my computer and do some research and here i am. i wish i had a camera to record this amazing event!
content.summary: Blinking or pulsating red light really high up in the sky. heading west. almost starlike

content.detailedDescription: My boyfriend and i were outside smoking on the back patio. i was noticing on how clear the sky was in we were pointing out stars to each other. out of the corner of my eye i saw this red flashing and pulsating light. it was so far up it looked star-like. i didn't really know what it was. it seemed to not be making any noise at all. i have never witnessed anything like this it was a little exciting. it was going in a straight path heading west. my boyfriend and i watched it until it dissappeared behind the houses. i had to immediately go straight to my computer and do some research and here i am. i wish i had a camera to record this amazing event!
content.summary: Blinking or pulsating red light really high up in the sky. heading west. almost starlike

content.detailedDescription: Posted a couple of photos of many jet contrails earlier...And have been watching for them ever since.  for a period of about 4 hours now, whenever there is more than 2 contrails, i have been going outside to take random photos to see why all these contrails are in the sky.  have taken pics of 3 bluish/glowing appearing objects in/near/around these contrails over the last 4 hours. here are 2 additional pics
content.summary: Observing many contrails and taking photos over a 4 hour period

content.detailedDescription: I was driving down i 70 when i saw 2 bright star light object they appeared to be disappearing and appearing suddenly while projecting a light then it suddenly went into the sky towards the stars
content.summary: Multiple object s

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were camping on an island on brule lake in the boundary waters in the arrowhead of minnesota. we were being loud and having a good time drinking and jamming the tunes on our dynamo radio, we also had a campfire burning. when it was time to hang up our food to keep bears from snatching it i shined a light up at the branch we planned on hanging it from, immediately after turning off the flashlight a bright white light turned on! it was shining directly down on us. the light was brighter than all the stars in the sky but not bright enough to notice it illuminating the ground around us. the light remained stationary for a couple seconds while my girlfriend and i reaffirmed that we were seeing the same thing. the light looked to be about 500 feet above us at about a 60 degree angle which would place it over the lake. the white light turned off and a light blue light remained, then the craft made a reverse "j" manuever that no human craft i know of would be capable of and then it zoomed out into space, faster than any human craft i know of. the strange thing about this is that neither of us felt any fear during or after the experience. it really seemed like they wanted us to know they were there. i am sure they were watching us for a while before we accidently "signaled" them.
content.summary: We were shining a light at a branch to hang our food and a light shined back on us

content.detailedDescription:
Around 9:30 p.M. i saw flashing lights in the sky, which looked like a star. as i watched though it was pulsating and moving slowly. over the course of an hour it went in a completely different location and i could see rays coming off of it. it was very high up and during the same time, i did see planes in the sky, and it did not have the same characteristics. also there were stars visible and they were not the same as this thing that i saw.
a while later it was completely gone.
content.summary: Strange lights and movement in the sky

content.detailedDescription: Was in the kitchen getting a cup of coffee, looked out patio door and noticed approximately 9-10 jet contrails very high in the sky- all headed the same direction, and sometimes intersecting.  curious as to what they may be doing, i got out the camera and began taking pictures.  these contrails were continuously appearing over a 2-3 hour period, and were alot more than there usually are which is what grabbed my attention. i took the memory card out of the camera, and took them to the pc to enlarge them to see if there was anything i hadn't personally seen with the naked eye. i am sending the photo which includes an unknown, glowing object, as well as the contrails that got my attention to begin taking pics. i did not seee this object with the naked eye.But the contrails were pretty impressive............
content.summary: Taking pics of lots of jet contrails and found an unidentified object in them

content.detailedDescription:
Laying in bed around 1am tv on low volume, i herd a loud pulsating hum coming from out side at first i thought it was a car out side the house but when i looked out the window there was no cars out there the street lights were of due to the councils energy saving policy and go off around midnight. i could still hear the humming but could not see anything it was pitch black out side darker than normal (no moon light) our road is a deadend road and not close to any main roads that get a lot of traffic.
  the pulsating hum was herd for about 15 mins and then just stopped. about 2 days later it happened again the same way, i have not herd it since
content.summary: Pulsating hum

content.detailedDescription:
On 2/18/2012 at aproximately 7:15 pm, my girlfriend and i were in the back yard of our lakeland home, and we observed a ufo. i am 58 years old, and by profession i am a child welfare case manager. she is 60 years old and a retired school board employee.

we were on the deck by the (open air)pool, i was watering plants and we had the dog out to take care of her business before we went in to watch a movie. my girl friend saw the object first and said tom look look what is that ????? she was pointing the the north east corner of the back yard sky.

she was pointing to a bright orange fire colored object that initially looked v-shaped or winged. i responded to her saying that looks like a plane on fire, because outside of the orange fire it looked to have some kind of winged shape. the object appeared in the east sky, its difficult to guess the distance but it was in the sky at about 120-140 degrees. she said when she initially saw it and started calling for me to look it was standing still. it is hard to describe the size, other than to say it was easily seen by the naked eye, if you held your arm out and made a fist looking out to the horizon this would represent the size of it. 

as we stood there in amazement, we quickly realized it was not a plane on fire, the object moved west ward in a straight line, at a slow rate of speed, i ran inside and got my binaculors, which took 10 seconds, when i came back the object was moving and then the object appeared to be stationary and hovering. this lasted for at least 30 seconds. it hung there so long, my girl went in to get the camera, when she did this, the object began moving again away from us to the north. when she got back with the camera is was moving away and up into the sky northward. it kept going until it disappeared. we did not get a picture of it. when i observed it thru the binoculors while it was stationary i did not see the winged shape which it first appeared to us it had. it appeared to be round or disk shaped with the burning orange fire colors.

the object had a unique fire ball orange-red-yellow color, like a setting sun, which is why at first it looked like a plane totally engulfed in flames. it made no noise, it left no trail. it is difficult to guess how far away from us it was in the sky. best guess is less than a mile. it was at aproximately 120 to 140 degrees on the horizon as we observed it.  when it moved away it went on a gradually rising trajectory until it disappeared. it was not a plane on fire, it was not a rocket launch i checked the nasa site there was no launch. it was a ufo.

the total encounter lasted aproximately 3 minutes. we are just normal people that pbserved something highly unusua.  we had just finished dinner and basically were in the back yard like we are on many many nights walking the dog and hanging out for 15 -20 minutes.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.shape: Boomerang,   Chevron,   Disc,   Fireball,   Oval,   Sphere
content.summary: Girlfriend and i saw bright fiery orange vshaped object hanging in the air.  slowly moved and stayed still for appox 1 min and then left

content.detailedDescription: Filmed object flying by jet/this is an update to try and get my film on
content.summary: Filmed object flying by jet

content.detailedDescription: First noticed light when in mother-in-law's driveway.  appeared to be a light moving in a repetitious path on some kind of aircraft.  the central light was yellowish, but it had a bright red cone of light around it, not unlike a laser light show.  the red cone did not extend much past the yellowish light and circulated with it.  it travelled east to west for a few minutes and then began to head north at which time the lights faded.  i would chock it up to a helicopter with a searchlight, but is was too high up ( just under the clouds) and it's light was not circulating in a pattern consistent with a localized suspect search (we have police helicopters flying over our house all the time).  i have never seen any aircraft with lights like i witnessed, nor circulating in the way that i saw, and we have many aircraft flying overhead or nearby.
content.summary: Circulating, yellowish light with red cone

content.detailedDescription: I was wlking to my bedroom and i heard a lot of dogs barking so i look around and then notice an orange light in the sky. at first i thought it was a plane since its normal to see them around here, but as it keep moving forward the light got stronger and brighter so i noticed it wasnt a plane considering that planes haver red, white blue lights flashing. when the light was almost in front of my bedroom window it blink twice and then dissapear. after that i went running downstairs to get a camera and got back to my room hoping to see something else, and i was really lucky cause a couple of minutes later the light appear again near from where i saw it the first time and then it kind of follow the same path but this time it was like descending until it look like it went behind some houses.
content.summary: A light in the sky that appear a  2 times
